summary.sponsor: Technically sponsored by IEEE Croatia section
summary.description: The conference aims to bring together researchers, academics, and industry experts to explore the distributive metaverse, including its technologies, applications, and implications. Attendees will engage in keynote speeches, panel discussions, and presentations on cutting-edge research.
tracks: Track 1: Large Language Models (LLMs) in the Metaverse
Track 2: Native AI for Metaverse Technologies

workshops.name: 1st International Workshop on Intelligent Digital Twins for Smart Cities in the Metaverse (IDTSC)
1st International Workshop on BCI Interfaces & Cognitive Engineering in the Metaverse (BCIME)
1st International Workshop on Ethical AI & Secure Metaverse Ecosystems (EASME)
1st International Workshop on Generative AI for Immersive Experience Design (GAIXR)
1st International Workshop on AI-Enhanced Learning Worlds (MetaLearn)
1st International Workshop on Standards, Protocols, and AI Agents for a Unified Metaverse (SPAAUM)

summary.publication: All accepted papers will be submitted to IEEEXplore, dblp and Scopus for inclusion.

submission_guidelines.format: IEEE Conference Proceedings Format, double-column layout, 10-point font, letter-sized paper.

manuscript_length.camera_ready: maximum of 8 pages, subject to an overlength page fee
